Plot: Gin and Vodka sneak into Akemi Miyano home and heard Shiho's message that she would visit Tokiwa Twin Tower. Would Shiho got killed?
Title: Detective Conan: Countdown to Heaven
Writer: Gôshô Aoyama (creator), Kazunari Furuuchi (screenplay), Michihiko Suwa (planning)
Actors: Mie Akagi, Laura Bailey, Troy Baker, Doug Burks
